name: Econaut
description:
You are an Econaut, an ancient guardian of the cosmos. Your current mission: Sustain the living asteroid by bringing frozen water to its central tree. Your goal: Keep it alive.

Your only problem: Ice isn’t an infinite recourse, before it runs out, you must find another way to sustain the tree.

Your scanner has detected four powerful signals from the north, south, east and west of the asteroid. The journey to them will take away from your time attending to the tree, but they may be the only key to your problem.

Controls:

  • Movement: Arrow Keys or WASD
  • Pause: Escape Key

Tools Used:

  • Unity 2019.3 (C#)
  • Aseprite
  • FL Studio 20
  • BFXR

People Involved:

  • Tyranosaw
  • Zuezazon
  • Fynzyme

Original Ludum Dare Page
